title: LISTEN: MNF Podcast - Jamie Carragher and Gary Neville
description: Jamie Carragher and Gary Neville join David Jones on Monday Night Football to discuss Manchester United's 3-0 win over Stoke.
content: Manchester United closed the gap on runaway league leaders Manchester City to 12 points after goals from Antonio Valencia, Anthony Martial and Romelu Lukaku swept aside Stoke, who had their new boss Paul Lambert watching on from the stands.The panel discussed Paul Pogba's man of the match performance before hearing from Jose Mourinho, who gave an update on Henrikh Mkhitaryan's future and any potential deal to bring Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez to Old Trafford.And after Tottenham's 4-0 victory over Everton, they talk Harry Kane's incredible goalscoring form before answering your questions in a Twitter Q&A.Listen to the Monday Night Football podcast here and more Sky Sports podcasts on iTunes
